title: First Day of 2020, Self-Image, Roscoe Wallace, Tommy's Sidepiece Etiquette and more.
itunes:title: First Day of 2020, Self-Image, Roscoe Wallace, Tommy's Sidepiece Etiquette and more.
description:
Good morning and welcome to the ride! Happy New Year everybody. Today's show is dedicated to all poultry distribution employees. Thank you for the joy!!! Americans have a certain opinion of their physical attractiveness. We have the best ways for you to know that certain situations just ain't none of yo damn business. Roscoe Wallace makes his first appearance of 2020. Fool #2 has another book that outline when you know things are about to jump off. The discuss Steve's new years resolutions and we find out how he is feeling about them so far. Nephew Tommy has his tips for sidepieces. There is also some random Q&A for the crew by the crew. Today in Closing Remarks, The CEO talks about moving out to move up, plus more.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
